item.title: Chapter I: The FIRE(d) Guide
item.description: Financial Independence, Retire Early (FI/RE) is a movement dedicated to savings (sometimes extreme) and investment that allows its followers to achieve financial freedom and early retirement far earlier than traditional retirement plans. Some proponents of the FIRE movement have retired as early as age 30, instead of the conventional and agreed upon retirement age of 65.
